.. _time:

Timeline of the project
=======================

+----------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------+
|         July         |                  August                  |             September             |              October              |
+----------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------+
| Brainstorming        | Web Page Basic                           | Optimisation              | Final | Additional Feature implementation |
+----------------------+------------------------------------------+---------------------------+-------+-----------------------------------+
| Hardware Procurement | Motor Calibration & encoder installation | Algorithm Implementation  | Final | Final Testing                     |
+----------------------+------------------------------------------+---------------------------+-------+-----------------------------------+
| PCB Design           | Design & Assembly                        | Math Model Implementation | Final | Final Testing                     |
+----------------------+------------------------------------------+---------------------------+-------+-----------------------------------+
